text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses the statutory voting thresholds relevant to the minority position, stating: \"With 25%, you will *not* have a statutory blocking minority for many matters (often 75% shareholder resolution threshold), so you need a contractual list to stop \u201cvalue shifting\u201d actions.\" This directly identifies the 75% threshold as the key statutory hurdle for key decisions.", "criterion_id": "31f8394e-84ae-4f8e-aec1-604a7e3aa5fe"}
